questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important to include in a data use policy?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Option C is an important element of a data use policy, but D is the better choice because it provides a comprehensive framework for managing data responsibly, ensuring compliance, and addressing all aspects of data collection and use.

Selected Answer: D
This occurs when personal data is used in ways that violate privacy laws, organizational policies, or customer expectations

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the GREATEST privacy threat when an organization wants to leverage artificial intelligence (AI) for marketing purposes?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The best way to determine and mitigate the associated risk is to encrypt the customer data and only decrypt it when there is a valid and reasonable purpose, such as investigating fraud
Why PIA and or DPIA are not part of the answer options

choices.D: Run a reversible hash on the customer data to allow for quick identification.
choices.A: Enforce multi-factor authentication (MFA) for the analysts working on the fraud alerts.
choices.C: Keep the customer data in clear text to allow for real-time response.
choices.B: Encrypt the customer data and decrypt only in cases of reasonable suspicion.

questions.question_text: An enterprise is planning to introduce a new product that involves geolocation tracking of customers. Which of the following is the BEST way to determine the associated risk?
Which type of flaw in an application programming interface (API) allows an attacker to manipulate legitimate standard functionality?

choices.C: Lack of resources and rate limiting

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A business logic misconfiguration specifically enables attackers to manipulate legitimate standard functionality in unintended ways
